title: Dull
review: I usually love anything that has to do with space or the Moon Landings. But this movie was paced very slow, and I didn't feel connected to any of the characters. I'm not sure if I can pin point the exact issue, but I felt that the portrayal of Armstrong fell flat.I did learn some interesting information through this film (didn't realize that the astronauts had to be quarantined for weeks after landing). So I enjoyed the informational element. But overall, this didn't connect with me on an emotional level, which was surprising considering the subject matter.

title: Watched it twice in theaters
review: I had never heard of the movie 'The Room' before seeing this film. So I wasn't sure what I was getting into. But I found myself captivated by this movie. It presents relatable themes set against a fascinating backdrop...a movie set.At its heart, this is a film about friendships and chasing after the American Dream. The fact that this is based on a true story just elevates the impact. It's a crazy story, but a fun one. Well done!

title: Generic / Dull
review:
This movie is missing something to make me care.
There isn't anything original, or interesting in the plot. And the characters felt flat.
